item.title: 5 ways to get over $2,000 of value from 100K Chase Ultimate Rewards points
item.description: Here are five redemptions to make to get over $2,000 of value from 100,000 Chase Ultimate Rewards points.

item.title: Smarter spending starts here: How Ramp can transform business finances
item.description: If you’re tired of juggling numerous business tools and credit cards, Ramp may just be the platform for you. Here’s what you need to know.

item.title: Citi Strata Card review: Phenomenal earning rates for a no-annual-fee card
item.description: The Citi Strata Card is the replacement of the Citi Rewards+ Card. Despite some changes to benefits, the Strata Card has improved earning rates.

item.title: Alaska Airlines bolsters West Coast flying with 7-route expansion across 12 cities
item.description: Alaska Airlines is adding seven new routes connecting cities in California, Oregon, Idaho and Washington.

item.title: Paul Gauguin Cruises ship cabin and suite guide: Everything you need to know
item.description: What are the cabins like on the one ship operated by luxury line Paul Gauguin Cruises? In a word, comfortable.
